channel.title: Creating a server from a blank base
channel.description:
soooo.. here i am again.
i decided to start making my own server from a blank base, because i want to be proud on something i built and not ripped and edited! so.. my problem is now: i download the 317serv, but when i have that, it does not contain any .java files that other servers do. i'm used to deltascape servers where all .java files already exist. such as client.java, clickingMost.java etc. but do i have to create those my own? and where do i start? i mean, what are neccesary files?
i hope someone would want to add me on msn or pm me and help me a bit with starting my own server. i want to do as much on my own, but i have no clue how i would start with this :')
don't tell me im not ready for a server. that's bullshit. i have a lot of experience with OOP, and some experience with Java. i have alreayd looked through and edited servers from the download section. but a base server is just completely different.
don't think i'm a noob and not help me because of that, i know how annoying it is to see newbs asking about things to seem hella easy to you and might sound stupid, but everyone has to start somewhere! :)
edit: oh, and help with adding modern emotes and GUI's and gfx, would help a lot too. i dont have a clue where to start

item.title: Creating a server from a blank base
item.dc:creator: @debeste95 debeste95
item.description:
@debeste95 wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:4, topic:379932”]If you can’t write your own java file(s), then I don’t think a scratch base is for you.
Maybe a base that has the file(s) but merely any code is probaly the best for you, if you’re knowledgable of Java.[/quote]

i have a lot of experience with OOP, and some experience with Java.
yes, i can write my own java files. no, i don't know what kind of files are neccesary and what methods exist in RuneScript. just a little explanation might be nice

also, the worst problem is the fact i don’t have a clue how to add wielding stuff and combat. might rip some stuff out of another server. just some help could be useful

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a server from a blank base

item.title: Creating a server from a blank base
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:4, topic:379932”]If you can’t write your own java file(s), then I don’t think a scratch base is for you.
Maybe a base that has the file(s) but [s]merely[s]barely any code is probaly the best for you, if you’re knowledgable of Java.[/quote]
[/grammar nazi]

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a server from a blank base

item.title: Creating a server from a blank base
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

If you can’t write your own java file(s), then I don’t think a scratch base is for you.
Maybe a base that has the file(s) but merely any code is probaly the best for you, if you’re knowledgable of Java.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a server from a blank base

item.title: Creating a server from a blank base
item.dc:creator: @debeste95 debeste95
item.description:
@debeste95 wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:2, topic:379932”]I think you’ll have to add them if you don’t already have them.

The main one you’ll need is Client.java so everything can be directed off it, Clickingmost.java is quite important too, to enable you to teleport or use simple actions.[/quote]yeah, thats what i thought. but i can’t seem to figure out how to get those. well, the ones from other servers contain stuff i dont need, i guess… i really need someone that can help me with this via msn or pb or something. just to explain me how to create a basic server

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a server from a blank base

item.title: Creating a server from a blank base
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

I think you’ll have to add them if you don’t already have them.

The main one you’ll need is Client.java so everything can be directed off it, Clickingmost.java is quite important too, to enable you to teleport or use simple actions.

Read full topic

soooo…
here i am again.

i decided to start making my own server from a blank base, because i want to be proud on something i built and not ripped and edited! so… my problem is now: i download the 317serv, but when i have that, it does not contain any .java files that other servers do. i’m used to deltascape servers where all .java files already exist. such as client.java, clickingMost.java etc. but do i have to create those my own? and where do i start? i mean, what are neccesary files?

don’t tell me im not ready for a server. that’s bullshit. i have a lot of experience with OOP, and some experience with Java. i have alreayd looked through and edited servers from the download section. but a base server is just completely different.

oh, and help with adding modern emotes and GUI’s and gfx, would help a lot too. i dont have a clue where to start
